price: Rabbiin Isa beyladoota, (garii ishee) yaabbattanii, (garii immoo) nyaattaniif isinii uumeedha.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-anʿāma litarkabū min'hā wamin'hā takulūna
